github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.lessons_learned: Learned that transient failures need robust handling - initial implementation is a good start.
github_commits.bug_related: Initial implementation focused on handling transient failures effectively; further refinement needed based on actual production data.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added RabbitMQ integration for core features
github_commits.lessons_learned: RabbitMQ integration is working, but need to monitor queue sizes closely.
github_commits.bug_related: RabbitMQ integration is a key component in the transient failure strategy.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Core features - Yaar, Core features pe kaam karna hai

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Core features pe kaam karna hai.  Speed chahiye!

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Code dekhungi main.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code.  It's looking okay so far.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  If it breaks, tension!

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  We‚Äôll catch it in testing.  Very important!

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Okay, so we're focusing on robust error handling, right?  Important for transient failures.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to prioritize robust error handling and monitoring for transient failures.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning: Transient failures need to be handled gracefully ‚Äì potential for production impact if not addressed.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Frequent discussion about 'production' and potential issues hints at the need for robust error handling.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Core Features - Yaar, speed chahiye!
jira_tickets.description: Detailed description of implementing core features, focusing on speed and robustness. Includes integration with RabbitMQ.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly related to the need for handling transient failures - the core focus of this sprint.

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Core Features - Speed and Transient Failures
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about implementing core features, with a strong emphasis on speed and robust handling of transient failures. Includes diagrams and code snippets.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
best_practices: Monitor queue sizes and response times.
common_mistakes: Ignoring transient failures ‚Äì leads to cascading issues.
Lack of proper logging ‚Äì makes debugging difficult.

google_docs.title: Sprint 2 Planning - Core Features - Yaar, Speed is Key!
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the sprint planning meeting, discussing the core features, prioritizing speed, and the importance of handling transient failures.  Action items assigned to team members.
decisions_made: Prioritize speed and robust error handling.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Continuous reference to 'production' and the need to avoid issues when things go wrong.
